description: This is a market group on predicting the statements made by Trump during his rally in Las Vegas, Nevada on October 24, at 7:00 PM ET.

markets.description:
Donald Trump has scheduled a town hall on October 24 in Las Vegas, Nevada (see: https://event.donaldjtrump.com/events/turning-point-pac-and-turning-point-action-to-host-united-for-change-rally-in-las-vegas-featuring-special-guest-president-donald-j-trump).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says "border" 35 or more times during their appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "border" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to a political boundary between nations.

If this candidate does not appear at this event, or if the event is otherwise cancelled or delayed beyond October 24, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.
markets.question: Will Trump say "border" 35 or more times during Las Vegas rally on October 24?
